title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI. Somehow, it is not supposed to do that.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, it emits a bell sound. Clicking on other buttons also produces the same sound.
EB: I expect that selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText should not emit a bell sound. Also, clicking on other buttons should not produce any sound.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the ControlExampleText.
2. Select SWT.MULTI from the dropdown.
3. Click on various buttons in the ControlExampleText.
